title: Peter's Purpose
description: Peter the porcupine is slow. He wants to be able to jump, run and fly like all of his classmates. When the class pet Larry goes missing, Peter tries his best to find Larry and prove himself, but his classmates just laugh at him. Peter is sick of being treated differently and being told he can't do anything. Will he realize his own abilities and prove his classmates wrong?
author: Jennifer Oramas
